snippet: Two Delhi doctors who allegedly left their 13-year old maid locked in their home during a vacation say the accusations are false.
abstract: Two Delhi doctors who allegedly left their 13-year old maid locked in their home during a vacation say the accusations are false.

byline.original: By NIKHILA GILL and HEATHER TIMMONS

headline.main: Delhi Doctor Couple Denies Charges of Maid Abuse
